revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Magma Hideout |image = [[File:Magma Hideout.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Magma Hideout. |tokens = 29,000 |location = West of Route 112 }} '''Magma Hideout''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 490,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=4|[[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude || [[File:Team_Magma_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Magma Grunt || [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena |- | [[File:Team_Magma_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Magma Grunt || [[File:Numel.png|40px]] Numel |- | [[File:Team_Magma_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Magma Grunt || [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena |- | [[File:Team_Magma_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Magma Grunt || [[File:Baltoy.png|40px]] Baltoy,[[File:Numel.png|40px]] Numel |- | rowspan=4|[[File:Graveler.png|40px]] Graveler || [[File:Team_Magma_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Magma Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | [[File:Team_Magma_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Magma Grunt || [[File:Numel.png|40px]] Numel |- | [[File:Team_Magma_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Magma Grunt || [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena |- | [[File:Team_Magma_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Magma Grunt || [[File:Baltoy.png|40px]] Baltoy |- | rowspan=5|[[File:Torkoal.png|40px]] Torkoal || [[File:Team_Magma_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Magma Grunt || [[File:Baltoy.png|40px]] Baltoy |- | rowspan=4|[[File:Magma_Admin.png|40px]] Magma Admin Tabitha || [[File:Numel.png|40px]] Numel, [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Camerupt.png|40px]] Camerupt |- |}

<tab name="Debuff"> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
